Articles.Content:
The title says it all who can make the biggest Capital ship to exist, they fall into these classes

1. Flagship

2. Carrier

3. Warship/Battleship

4. Dreadnought

5. Cruiser

Details are needed about the ships class, size, Delta V, and its armament if it has one, I am excited to see what the community can make, lets see some ships !

Is hyperedit allowed?

he said make, not fly.

Allow me to make the first submission:

Mods: B9 Areospace and Kerbal Engineer Redux

Class: Carrier (holds 12 kerbals and 4050 liquid fuel)

Delta V (estimated): 2060

Armament: None (unless smashing it into things counts)

This can easily be beat, so go ahead!
I like it, Keep it coming people!

Brought over from my post in KIDI

Stock except hyperedit and engineer. Its around 550 parts!!!

The XFr-8. This time next to Donlokimon's XC-305.

Mass: 1023 Tons

TWR: 0.37

Dv: 11198m/s

Edited July 8, 2013 by Comrade Jenkens

-room for 17 kerbals,9500m/s empty / 8000m/s full,advanced IVA`s and debris missile scramblers.

originally built to carry frigates it was too laggy and was destroyed.Roughly 11 long 1.75m fueltanks in length.
Nice, I love the 3 ships so far you Kerbals are pretty good at your ship building Keep it up
I got a big one coming. Stay tuned!

This is the thing i made a while back.

I would put it in a flagship category.

Armaments: none (altho it could defend itself by crashing probes or docking tugs into an enemy as it has many)

DeltaV: practically infinite, as its capable to refuel itself with kethane miner.

Carries:

* SSTO plane for atmospheric Survey

* Robotic Kethane miner

* Lander with rover (capable of return from duna or smaller)

* Comms satelites to form a Tetrahedral multi-satellite continuous-coverage constellation

* Kethane and mapsat probes

Bonus:

was put in orbit without cheats (no hyper edit or overpowered mods), altho not in a single launch, it took 4 launches to get it done.
